name: Switched
description:
Switch perspective and become the hunter instead of the hunted.

"Inspired" by the Disc Room game -  Part of the Disc Room Game Jam

  • Play with Controller/Keyboard/Mouse/Touch
  • Mobile or Desktop

SFX's were provided by the jam runners (from Disc Room game). All the rest was made during the jam in Godot game engine.

Note: downloaded version probably runs better than browser version

Don't forget to rate the game or leave a comment!
